text:
rition Programme Case Studies
India
Two major health and nutrition programmes were evaluated: Integrated Child Development 
Scheme (ICDS) and Tamil Nadu Integrated Nutrition Programme (TINP). TINP 1, funded 
by the World Bank, operated from 1980 to 1989 and TINP II operated from 1990 to 1997. 
ICDS was initiated by the Government of India (GoI) in 1975 and continues today. From 
1990 to 1997, the World Bank supported ICDS I in Orissa and Andhra Pradesh, and from 
1993 to 2001, supported ICDS II
